MemoryInfobox.description: 'Ready or not, the Piracy|pirates stormed Alponos. Despite everything that had happened, Kassandra agreed to stand beside Megakles and fight. Hopefully it would be enough...'

General_Description: '''Here Be Pirates''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]] and a memory of Layla herself.
Section_Description: Faced with a [[Piracy|pirate]] invasion, Kassandra stood beside [[Megakles]] and fought.
Section_Dialogue:
With the pirates invading Alponos, Kassandra and Megakles rush to defend it.

*'''Megakles:''' ''Some of the villagers have armed themselves.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''They still need us to fight with them. Go!''

While dispatching the first wave of pirates, a second group arrives.

*'''Civilian''': ''Help us!''
*'''Civilian''': ''I don't want to die!''

After dispatching the second wave of pirates, a third and final group invades Alponos.

*'''Kassandra''': ''Megakles! There's more coming!''
*'''Megakles''': ''I see them!''

Eventually, all threats are eliminated, and Kassandra speaks to Megakles.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''You fought well.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''As did you. Forget what happened before. We're alive because of you.''

<tabber>
|-|Combat – Now you die because of me.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I am so sick of you and this cursed town.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''I'll kill you where you stand!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I've killed everyone else in Alponos. What makes you so different?''
Kassandra fought and killed Megakles. She then obtained a note from his body, written by the imposter.
|-|Time to pay up.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Don’t thank me. Just pay me.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''You ''mercenaries'' are all the same. But we agreed – here is everything that was left in Alponos's treasury.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Now I need to find my impersonator.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''I can help. I found this note on the pirate leader. They owe him a lot of drachmae. He was hired to sabotage the town.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Making invasion easier.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''Their plan would have worked, if the ''real'' Eagle Bearer hadn't shown up. What will you do when you find him?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll think of something.''
|-|I'm glad Alponos is safe.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''No need to thank me, Megakles. I'm just glad the people of Alponos are safe.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''You may not want thanks, but you deserve it. I promised everything in the treasury, and that's what you're getting.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Now I need to find my impersonator.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''I can help. I found this note on the pirate leader. They owe him a lot of drachmae. He was hired to sabotage the town.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Making invasion easier.''
*'''Megakles:''' ''Their plan would have worked, if the ''real'' Eagle Bearer hadn't shown up. What will you do when you find him?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll think of something.''
</tabber>
Section_Outcome: Kassandra fought together with the local populace and Megakles and killed all invading pirates. She obtained a clue from that would set her on the path of finding the [[Eagle Bearer (imposter)|imposter]] pretending to be the Eagle Bearer.
